snippet: Updates from Apple's keynote presentation at its Worldwide Developers Conference, where it is expected to introduce upgrades to its mobile operating system, iOS, including a new map service that does not rely on Google. The company may also talk...
abstract: Updates from Apple's keynote presentation at its Worldwide Developers Conference, where it is expected to introduce upgrades to its mobile operating system, iOS, including a new map service that does not rely on Google. The company may also talk about new Mac computers and features for its next Mac operating system.
